name: Bear Pong
description:
Chapter 5

The Party 🎉

There is plenty of dancing at the party. The mood is cheerful, Penelope tries to flirt with Milo while he serves his thirsty buddies one drink after another. Of course, some of them can't resist challenging each other in little games.

Milo grins and holds up his bottle

"Who's up for a game of Beer Pong?"
